title: Ticket #5089: Allow at most one submit retry for FINAL nodes
description: A user on htcondor-users reported a DAG problem involving FINAL nodes. I haven't fully diagnosed the problem yet, but one aspect of it is that condor_submit is failing for their final node. At any rate, I don't think you should get the normal number of submit retries on a FINAL node, because, especially if DAGMan was condor_rm'ed, it shouldn't be waiting around very long before quitting...
remarks:
2015-Jun-11 09:52:10 by wenger:
Hmm -- maybe just do this if DAGMan has been condor_rm'ed?
